alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:08PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rio Blanco County through 545 PM MDT... At 508 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Rangely, or 54 miles southeast of Vernal, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Rio Blanco County. This includes Colorado 139 between mile markers 54 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
